description: Verify that after multiply filtering all products corresponds to selected filter options

steps.name: ProductCategoryPage: open product type page by category NOTEBOOKS_CATEGORY(c80004)
ProductPage: get product type page visibility status by locating page heading
FilterSideBar: get filter with name gotovo-k-otpravke
Filter: select option with name Готовий до відправлення
FilterSideBar: get filter with name producer
Filter: select option with name Dell
